issue.title: [R] Use TableSourceNode instead of InMemoryDataset
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15817](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15817). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Followup to ARROW-15258. Allows us to use the query engine without ARROW_DATASET, and it's nice to just keep around the object that was provided instead of transforming it.
